trans_title: 恶海捕蟹记：血脉篇 第三季
introduction: The 10th anniversary of Captain Phil Harris' final season on the Bering Sea is approaching, and Josh Harris makes a personal journey to rediscover what made his father a legend, and embrace the legacy he inherits as Phil's son and cocaptain of the Cornelia Marie.Episodes include…S3 E1 	The Other BrotherS3 E2	Treacherous GroundsS3 E3	Leaving Las VegasS3 E4	Father Knows BestS3 E5	Deep SouthS3 E6	Swamp CaptainsS3 E7	A Crack in the MysteryS3 E8	Divide and ConquerS3 E9	Category 4S3 E10	Cataclysm in Kona
chinese_title: 恶海捕蟹记：血脉篇 第三季
